multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I have a large, hard, brown-colored, and hairless patch on my right forearm that used to be slightly pink a few months ago.
Has the size of the patch changed over time?
No, the size of the patch has not changed over time.
Do you have any similar patches elsewhere on your body?
No, I do not have any similar patches elsewhere on my body.
How old are you?
I am 46 years old.
Do you have any personal or family history of skin cancer or other skin conditions?
No, I have no relevant family or personal history of skin conditions or skin cancer.
Have you had any recent injuries, burns, or infections on your forearm where the patch is located?
No, I have not had any recent injuries, burns, or infections on my forearm where the patch is located.
Final Diagnosis: Dermatofibroma
